name: VPNGatewayRoutePropagation
shortDesc: Enables a virtual private gateway (VGW) to propagate routes to the routing tables of a VPC.

properties.name: RouteTableIds
properties.desc: A list of routing table IDs that are associated with a VPC. The routing tables must be associated with the same VPC that the virtual private gateway is attached to.

properties.name: VpnGatewayId
properties.desc: The ID of the virtual private gateway that is attached to a VPC. The virtual private gateway must be attached to the same VPC that the routing tables are associated with.
